parts: (a)    when construction of a clinic at Kalumwange Centre in Lalafuta Ward will commence;
(b)    when the pharmacy which was gutted by fire at Nkeyema Clinic will be reconstructed;
(c)    whether the Government has any plans to upgrade Nkeyema Clinic to a District Hospital status; and
(d)    if so, what measures the Government has taken to upgrade the Clinic.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development what the results of the exploration carried out in Namibwe area of Kaoma Central Parliamentary Constituency are.
Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)    whether the 30km stretch of the road between Kapalala and Milenge Boma, which is in a deplorable state, will be repaired before the onset of the rains; and
(b)    if not, what contingent measures the Government will take to ensure that Milenge District is not cut off from the rest of the country.
(a)    when the roadmap for the enactment of a new Constitution will be published;
(b)    whether the Government has included, in its roadmap, the holding of a Referendum as a way of adopting the constitution;
(c)    if so, when that Referendum is expected to be held; and
(d)    what the estimated cost of holding a Referendum is.

parts: (a)    when the Social Cash Transfer Programme will be introduced in the North-Western Province; and
(b)    in which districts the programme will be introduced over the period of five years from 2013.
